page.title: 06Whitehills Community School
page.content:
{Whitehills Primary School} Built 1977.(Old School 1874) (See P. 2) Community use includes Youth Clubs,Brownies, Cubs, Scouts, Guides,Bowling Club, Keep Fit, Evening Classes & Lectures. Daytime use includes Playgroup, Chiropody Clinic, Postnatal Clinic, Meals On Wheels, Young Wives & Mothers, Teachers' In-Service and Youth Leaders' Courses.
{Parent/Teachers Association }Committee of 12 parents elected annually in rotation. Act as Instructors, Escorts, Fundraisers, (Â£1267 in 1984/5) Now engaged in correspondence with local M.P. and Regional Councillors (in which they accuse officials of bureaucratic paper-shuffling and lack of common sense) in an attempt to maintain school staffing during a temporary drop in roll.
